source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CUSTOMERCOUNT FROM SALESLT.CUSTOMER;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * 
FROM [SalesLT].[Customer]
 where ModifiedDate >= '@{pipeline().parameters.Startdate}'
 and ModifiedDate <='@{pipeline().parameters.Enddate}'
